channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How AI PR startup Clipbook won Mark Cuban’s investment from a cold email
item.description: Adam Joseph was shocked when Mark Cuban replied to his email with an inquisition full of questions.

item.title: Nvidia announces new open AI models and tools for autonomous driving research
item.description: Nvidia continues its push into physical AI with the release of a new reasoning world model and other tools for physical AI.

item.title: 39 Best Cyber Monday Tech Deals (2025)
item.description: Behold the best Cyber Monday tech deals this weekend on WIRED-tested and approved gadgetry of all kinds.

item.title: 12 Best Cyber Monday Home Security Deals 2025
item.description: If you want to secure your property, these Cyber Monday security camera deals are worth a look.

item.title: The Best Cyber Monday Streaming Deals (2025): HBO Max, Disney+, Apple
item.description: Hulu and HBO Max and Disney are all offering terrific Cyber Monday streaming deals in 2025. Time to make a burner email?

item.title: Shopify resolves outage disrupting merchants on Cyber Monday
item.description: Shopify was down for many merchants this morning. preventing them from processing transactions. It appears to be fixed now.

item.title: At least 80 new tech unicorns were minted in 2025 so far
item.description: Using data from Crunchbase and PitchBook, TechCrunch tracked down the VC-backed startups that became unicorns so far this year.

item.title: MKBHD’s wallpaper app Panels is shutting down
item.description: From the time Brownlee launched Panels in September 2024, the app struggled to find an audience of its own. "We knew it was niche … and ultimately, we...

item.title: AWS re:Invent 2025: How to watch and follow along live
item.description: Amazon Web Services’ big annual event, re:Invent 2025, is getting into full swing in Las Vegas this week, and you can follow the keynotes live right h...

item.title: Construction workers are cashing in on the AI boom
item.description: "I pinch myself going to work every day," one 51-year-old says of his new supervisor role overseeing 200 workers at a data center site.
